txt.en: The spirit fades into nothingness, relinquishing its anger
DNT - Find and burn Curig's corpse
Delun has asked you to find what's left of her friends in Gond Orchal and burn their bodies. They're somewhere north-west of Delun's location.\n\nYou should start with Einion.
A solemn breeze whistles through the barrows
DNT - Find and burn Melwyn's corpse
Return to Delun outside of Gond Orchal
DNT
The oppressive atmosphere dissipates at once
Find and burn Einion's corpse
DNT

'You must be one who offered to help Delun. She told me what happened before... before she...

'At least... she realized I had survived, after all.

'I'll do what I can for her. Please, leave me. I wish to be alone.'
Delun has asked you to find what's left of her friends in Gond Orchal and burn their bodies. They're somewhere north-west of Delun's location.\n\nMelwyn is the last person you must find.
Delun has asked you to find what's left of her friends in Gond Orchal and burn their bodies. They're somewhere north-west of Delun's location.\n\nYou should search for Curig next.
Talk to Muna
It may be too late to rescue the people who have been dragged into Gond Orchal, but they can still be saved in death.
Last Wishes
A stranger silently watches over Delun's unmoving body
The remains of Delun's friends have been found.\n\nYou should return to her location outside of Gond Orchal.
Find and burn Curig's corpse
Find and burn Melwyn's corpse

The bloodied woman looks up in shock. She flinches and almost scrambles to flee before something dawns upon her.

'You -- you're no wight. Are you here to rescue us? I-I beg of you, find my friends. They... they killed Muna first, then dragged the rest of us into the barrows. I managed to crawl out, but... Einion, Curig, Melwyn... they're somewhere further north-west.

'Please, if you find... what's left of them, burn them. My injuries can wait.'
You returned too late.\n\nThe stranger seems to have something to say to you.
